Klorane Golden Highlights Shampoo - Imported (400 ml) Price: Rs.3600

Klorane Golden Highlights Shampoo with Chamomile Extract 13. 4 fl oz (400 ml). With chamomile extractsfair or light brown hairKlorane chamomile extractOriginating from Mediterranean regions chamomile matricaria a large and very aromatic annual plant is now widely present in Europe. the flowers characterized by the pleasant fragrance of their yellow capitulum are harvested between May and September to then be dried. Its extract prepared under heat contains apigenin a yellow-colored flavoric pigment which leaves blonde and golden highlights in the hair. It is also endowed with softening and calming properties. Proven effectivenessAssociated to a softening and volume-enhances extra-gentle emulsifying base Klorane s shampoo withchamomile extract givesthe hair its golden highlights: the apigenin it contains binds to capillary fibers to delicately coatthe scales withoutpenetrating into its core therefore gradually intensifying the blond and golden shades in the hair. Formulated without coloring orartificial bleaching substances. Klorane s shampoo with chamomile extract puts back the shine and radiance in blond or chestnut brown hair. Hypoallergenic product. Klorane Soothing Shampoo with Peony Extract 13. 4 fl oz (400 ml). Irritated itchy scalpsKlorane and plantsAll Klorane plants are selected for their recognized activity and perfect safety. They are grown and harvested in compliance with very strict norms to guarantee their quality: the Klorane plant research procedure. Obtained according to the scientific of the pharmaceuticals industry their extracts are specially designed and dosed in active ingredients thereby ensuring constant efficacy. Klorane peony extractA beautiful plant originally from the Far East and in particular China whose Latin name of Paeonia means effective cure. in the East the peony is a symbol. Klorane s extract of peony contains an interesting ingredient paeoniflorine as its soothing action against irritations and free radicals has been scientifically demonstrated. Proven effectivenessKlorane extract of peony soothes the most sensitive scalps and has been incorporated into a very gentle conditioning and volumizing cleaning base. Its soothing virtues and extreme gentleness make this shampoo a particularly effective treatment for the irritated and itchy scalps often experienced by dandruff sufferers. Hypoallergenic product.
